publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Isaiah 39
ab.l: Ol vaḥtta ijdi Ḿeroʾdaḫbalʾadan uvlu Balʾadannyn biji Bav́eĺniń bitikĺar da b́erńa Ḥizqijahuɣa ėšitir sortun ki ḥastalanyb́edi da ḱoč́ajdi.

Da bijańdi alar üč́uń Ḥiźqijahu da ḱorǵuź- d́u alarɣa ḥazna juv́uń ol ḱuḿuš́ńu da ol altynny da ol ot- jamlarny da ol jahšy olivany da bar savutlar juv́uńuń da bary ńeki
tabuladyr ḥaznalarynda joɣedi andi ńerśa ki ḱorǵuźḿagej Ḥiźqijahu juv́uńd́a da bar ėrkĺańḿagińd́a.
Da keĺdi Ješaʿjahu ol navi ol bijǵa Ḥiźqijahuɣa da ajtty anar ńe ajttylar ol ėŕańĺar uš- pular da qajdan keĺdiĺar saja da ajtty Ḥiźqijahu jyraḥ jerd́ań keĺdiĺar maja Bav́eĺd́ań.
Da ajtty ńe ḱord́uĺar juv́ujd́a da ajtty Ḥiźqijahu bary ńeki juv́umd́a ḱord́uĺar joɣedi andi ńerśa ki ḱorǵuźḿa- dim ḥaznalarymda.
Da ajtty Ješaʿjahu Ḥiźqijahuɣa tynlaɣyn śoźuń H-nyn T́eńrisiniń ćevaʾotnun.
Muna ḱuńĺar keĺadirĺar da ėĺtir dušman baryn ńeki juv́ujd́a da ńeki yštyrdylar atalaryj ušpu ḱuńǵa d́ejiń Bav́elǵa qalmastyr ńeḿed́a ajtty H.
Da ulanlaryjdan ki tuvsalar śeńd́ań ki tuvdursej alyrlar da bolurlar v́ezirĺarǵa sarajynda bijiniń Baveĺniń.
Da ajtty Ḥiźqijahu Ješaʿjahuɣa jaḥšydyr śoźu H-nyn ki śoźĺadij da ajtty ančaḥ bolsun bazlyḥ da tirlik ḱuńĺarimd́a.
